Package org.zaproxy.zap.spider

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SpiderListener
    The listener interface for receiving spider related events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DomainAlwaysInScopeMatcher
    Class that contains rules to checks if a domain is in scope.
    Spider
    The Class Spider.
    SpiderController
    The SpiderController is used to manage the crawling process and interacts directly with the Spider Task threads.
    SpiderParam
    The SpiderParam wraps all the parameters that are given to the spider.
    SpiderTask
    The SpiderTask representing a spidering task performed during the Spidering process.
    URLCanonicalizer
    The URLCanonicalizer is used for the process of converting an URL into a canonical (normalized) form.
    URLResolver
    The UrlResolve handles the process of resolving a relative URL against a base URL (context).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SpiderParam.HandleParametersOption
    This option is used to define how the parameters are used when checking if an URI was already visited.
